explanation: [0-0] A young man in pajamas is sitting cross-legged on a bed, looking at the mobile phone in his hand. A bag of red-packaged potato chips is placed beside his leg, and several plush toys are placed behind him.

[0-6] Then the man uses the other hand to take the potato chips in the bag. The man brings a potato chip to his mouth and uses the other hand to support it under his mouth to prevent the crumbs from falling on the bed. Then the man takes a gentle bite of the potato chips. Afterward, the man pours the crumbs from his hand back into the bag, then puts the bag containing the crumbs to the right, stretches, and prepares to sleep.
